name: 希望之光1：灵菌涅槃
description:
Light of Hope 1 Fungi Spirulina is a challenging strategy wargame, in which the player will play as an adventurer, from meeting to fighting alongside various partners with distinctive abilities, building the strongest adventurer team step by step!
Carefully designed maps and tactically variable enemies, so that every move is full of games, each enemy needs to go all out. The control of the battlefield and the formation will directly determine the life and death of the squad!

Story introduction

This story is about a group of people who were chosen to fight against oppression and gain freedom after the Earth was enslaved by an alien race. The storyline is light and witty, and the characters are colorful. In addition to the standard ending of the game, the game also contains a hidden true ending for you to discover.

Game Features

Meet interesting partners with distinctive features, each with their own exclusive skills and different fighting styles, use their abilities to build your all-around team!


The enemy has a wide variety of tactics[/b], such as fire at full strength to cause attrition, quick backward sneak attacks on priests, and side raids on both sides, so every action is a wonderful game of combat.


Carefully designed maps with access to favorable terrain such as woods, valleys, castles, and villages give key bonuses and a huge advantage for combat. At the same time, terrain such as cliffs and narrow passages can also limit the squad's standings, and the choice of terrain for battle will directly affect success or failure.


Each character has exclusive battle animations and critical hit animations, and will have different battle animations depending on their abilities!




Features a reins mount system that allows you to ride mounts by using reins in order to change the way units move!


For hardcore players looking for a higher challenge, we've also got hard mode where teammates will permanently retire once they die!
